Recap: Schuyler concludes that if something happens to Stacy or to Rex, he needs Stacy to sign over guardianship to him. She does so in exchange for his helping her to induce labor so that Rex will believe the baby is his. Rex runs into Dorian and tells her she needs to do something about Mitch. She then contacts Charlie and tells him that she has an idea about how to get Rex to let Jessica go, involving "somebody" who is more important to Mitch than Jessica. Mitch and the nurse hold Jessica captive, drug her and intend to brainwash her to forget all the people she loves and raise Rex and Stacy's baby with him.
